title: Senior Systems Engineer
full_description: Senior Systems EngineerWe are currently seeking to hire a Senior Systems Engineer  to become an integral part of our development team! Additionally, holds a CUA/CXA or equal Certification.Experience with Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration techniques delivering software to the cloud.Experience in test-driven development and automated testing practices.Leading and mentoring junior-level engineers.Experience writing and building cloud-native applications.Experience working independently with clients or stakeholders conducting interviews, observations, and surveys to successfully create a user-story.Experience designing full-service consumer and business applications.Experience in research, visual design, graphic design, consulting, and/or development.US Government experience.Senior Systems Engineer
